Name: Ocean Man
About the game: This is a role-playing turn-based game. In the game, you will play a captain and lead your team to explore the ocean and find the treasure! You need to sail in the ocean, explore different islands, sometimes encounter sea monsters. You will find new partners, expand your team and adventure with them. Feature: Beautiful Ocean The real and fantasy sea, your ship sails on the sea, Different weather and day and night systems make you immersive. Ocean Adventure There are many different marine life in the sea, Including dolphins, turtles, sharks and more than 20 kinds of creatures, Some sea creatures will frighten and run away when they see you, There are also some sea creatures that will actively attack you, You can even capture them as partners, Make sea adventure more exciting and fun. Many Game Modes A variety of different game modes, such as island exploration, ocean battle, sea monster challenges, and more. Pet Systems The pet system is very special, each pet has different characteristics, Some are born geniuses, some are late bloomers, with Superman cards, It can be said that there are many ways to play, and there are many different genres. Global PVP The game contains the function of global PVP, Players can duel with players from all over the world, Further deepen the interaction between players.
